module OpenCV.Internal.Core.ArrayOps
    ( NormType(..)
    , NormAbsRel(..)
    , marshalNormType
    )
    where

import "base" Data.Bits ( (.|.) )
import "base" Data.Int

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------


{-# LINE 20 "src/OpenCV/Internal/Core/ArrayOps.hsc" #-}

{-# LINE 21 "src/OpenCV/Internal/Core/ArrayOps.hsc" #-}


{-# LINE 23 "src/OpenCV/Internal/Core/ArrayOps.hsc" #-}

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-- | Normalization type
data NormType
   = Norm_Inf
   | Norm_L1
   | Norm_L2
   | Norm_L2SQR
   | Norm_Hamming
   | Norm_Hamming2
   | Norm_MinMax
     deriving (Show, Eq)

data NormAbsRel
   = NormRelative
   | NormAbsolute
     deriving (Show, Eq)

c'NORM_INF = 1
c'NORM_INF :: (Num a) => a

{-# LINE 43 "src/OpenCV/Internal/Core/ArrayOps.hsc" #-}
c'NORM_L1 = 2
c'NORM_L1 :: (Num a) => a

{-# LINE 44 "src/OpenCV/Internal/Core/ArrayOps.hsc" #-}
c'NORM_L2 = 4
c'NORM_L2 :: (Num a) => a

{-# LINE 45 "src/OpenCV/Internal/Core/ArrayOps.hsc" #-}
c'NORM_L2SQR = 5
c'NORM_L2SQR :: (Num a) => a

{-# LINE 46 "src/OpenCV/Internal/Core/ArrayOps.hsc" #-}
c'NORM_HAMMING = 6
c'NORM_HAMMING :: (Num a) => a

{-# LINE 47 "src/OpenCV/Internal/Core/ArrayOps.hsc" #-}
c'NORM_HAMMING2 = 7
c'NORM_HAMMING2 :: (Num a) => a

{-# LINE 48 "src/OpenCV/Internal/Core/ArrayOps.hsc" #-}
c'NORM_MINMAX = 32
c'NORM_MINMAX :: (Num a) => a

{-# LINE 49 "src/OpenCV/Internal/Core/ArrayOps.hsc" #-}

c'NORM_RELATIVE = 8
c'NORM_RELATIVE :: (Num a) => a

{-# LINE 51 "src/OpenCV/Internal/Core/ArrayOps.hsc" #-}

marshalNormType :: NormAbsRel -> NormType -> Int32
marshalNormType absRel normType =
    case absRel of
      NormRelative -> c'normType .|. c'NORM_RELATIVE
      NormAbsolute -> c'normType
  where
    c'normType = case normType of
        Norm_Inf      -> c'NORM_INF
        Norm_L1       -> c'NORM_L1
        Norm_L2       -> c'NORM_L2
        Norm_L2SQR    -> c'NORM_L2SQR
        Norm_Hamming  -> c'NORM_HAMMING
        Norm_Hamming2 -> c'NORM_HAMMING2
        Norm_MinMax   -> c'NORM_MINMAX
